Privacy RuleLegislation and Regulation, additional information

Vulnerability Disclosure PolicyCDC is committed to ensuring the security of the American public by protecting their information from unwarranted disclosure. This policy is intended to give security researchers clear guidelines for conducting vulnerability discovery activities and to convey our preferences in how to submit discovered vulnerabilities to us.
